fields.name: Please tell us who is completing your application form.

source.name: I'm completing my application on my own.
I have Power of Attorney (POA) or other authorization under state law and am applying on someone's behalf.

commentsOnValue.comment: (Please note: Power of Attorney must cover the ability to make healthcare decisions and usually referred to as a Durable Power of Attorney for Healthcare or Healthcare Power of Attorney. You will be receiving a request for supporting documentation upon your enrollment.  This supporting documentation is required in order to remain on the plan.)

fields.content: To complete this section, refer to your Medicare card.  Please fill in the information exactly as it appears on your card.

Typically you may only enroll in a Medicare Advantage or Prescription Drug Plan during the Annual Election Period (AEP) between October 15th and December 7th of each year.  However, there are exceptions that may allow you to enroll in a Medicare Advantage or Prescription Drug Plan outside of those election periods. Selection of an option below certifies that to the best of your knowledge, the consumer is eligible for the Enrollment Period selected.  If we later determine that this information is incorrect, the consumer may be dis-enrolled.

source.name: AEP
source.description:
Available: {{date.start}} - {{date.end}}

Usage: Only 1 AEP election may be used per year.

source.name: IEP
source.description: Available: For PDP or MAPD - Three months before, the month of, and three months after becoming eligible of Medicare.

source.name: ICEP
source.description:
Available:
For MA-only - Three months before, the month of, and three months after becoming eligible of Medicare.
For delayed Part B for MA or MAPD - During the three months prior to the Part B effective date.

source.name: OEPI
source.description:
Available: Can be used all year

Usage: Starts the month a beneficiary is institutionalized and ends 2 months after the beneficiary moves out of an institution.

source.name: SEP
source.description: Typically, you may enroll in a Medicare Advantage or Prescription Drug plan during the Annual Enrollment Period between October 15 and December 7 of each year. There are exceptions that may allow you to enroll outside of this period. Please read the following statements carefully and select the option that applies to the applicant. By selecting any of the following SEP options you are certifying that, to the best of your knowledge, the text is a true statement about the applicant. If we later determine that this information is incorrect, the applicant may be disenrolled.

fields.name: Proposed effective date
fields.customError: Based on the information provided you are not eligible for this election period at this time.

fields.name: Check if your mailing address is different from your physical address
I wish to provide an Emergency Contact
Please use my POA as my Emergency Contact
Would you like to learn more about receiving materials electronically?

fields.content:
Materials On-Line:
You have the option to receive most of your plan and coverage materials securely on-line instead of in paper format. This is a faster, easier method providing you the convenience to access your materials whenever you need them, while also significantly reducing the amount of mail you would receive from Humana. If you answer "Yes" to this option, you will receive an initial email with a link that will take you to the MyHumana registration page. Once you register, your digital well experience begins.
I choose to receive the following documents on-line:
• Verification Letter
• Member Guide
• Plan Coverage Package
• Evidence of Coverage
• Summary of Benefits
• Plan Rating
• Value-added services
• Provider Directory
• Drug Guide
• Health Risk Assessment
• Health and Wellbeing Toolkit
• Annual Notice of Change with Evidence of Coverage
• Smart Summary

fields.name: Would you like to receive these communications online?
fields.correctFieldToCheckComment: Here is the mail address you provided:
fields.missingFieldToCheckError: Email address cannot be blank, please enter an email address in the Demographics section

fields.content: Note to agent: if asked, the member can elect to receive certain documents by changing their preferences online at MyHumana or by calling Customer Service.

fields.name: Preferred Method of Communication
fields.missingFieldToCheckError: Phone number cannot be blank, please enter a phone number in the demographics section.

fields.name: Are you an established patient of the physician you selected?

Some people may have other drug coverage including private insurance, TRICARE, federal employee health benefits coverage, VA benefits, or State pharmaceutical assistance programs. Will you have other prescription drug coverage in addition to the plan for which you are applying?

If you have employer, medical and/or prescription drug coverage, do you understand your existing coverage will end and be replaced by the coverage applied for today, once accepted by the Centers for Medicare and Medicaid Services?
Are you currently a resident in a nursing home or long-term care facility?
Are you interested in a supplemental benefit plan (Dental, Vision, etc.)?

fields.content: All required information must be completed before you can select a signature method.

*Please inform the applicant of the following: Your coverage will begin on the first day of the next month as long as Humana has your completed and signed enrollment form no later than the last day of this month. If Humana receives your completed enrollment form after the last day of this month, your coverage will not begin until the first day of the following month.

fields.name: Choose the preferred signature method for this enrollment
